name: Be My Baby banner
description:
»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»

BACK IN STOCK!
I have a very limited stock that is made and ready to ship! Order before they are sold out and once again placed on pre-order!

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»


I am happy to introduce my newest banner style- my handmade take on the throw-away party store letter banners.

Surprise your special someone by hanging an extraordinary way of saying 'I love you' in an ordinary place! Think about their daily routine and where they'd really appreciate a sweet reminder of your love. Hang it above your bed, on the inside of your home's front door, amongst your art collection, in a baby's room.
● Delicate fringe in pale peachy pink hangs from a shimmering cord secured with a floral sequin on each side. The letters are in my own handwriting, hand-cut with scissors, and sprinkled with the tiniest golden rectangular shaped glitter.
● About 18 inches long with additional cord on each side for tying.
* I found this banner to be difficult to photograph..it is easier to read in person.
● Guess what, these banners were written up on Nylon Magazine Daily, Refinery29, and Martha Stewart's Wedding Blog!
● Want to see a quick little video of the Love Always banner sparkling? Visit:
http://www.nice-etc.com/2011/03/sparkle-shimmer-shine-and-glitter.html


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

www.Nice-Etc.com

www.facebook.com/NiceByCaitlinHolcomb

name: Wild Heart banner
description:
»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»
I M P O R T A N T

● This is available for pre-order. This item can be purchased, but will ship 3-4 weeks from the purchase date ●

The Wild Heart banners have once again sold out, so during this busy time of year I am making more as they are ordered. It's very exciting that these banners are in such high demand and I am working as quickly as I can!
Upon checkout, if you could please let me know that you read and understand this time frame in the message to seller box. Thank you so much! :)

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»


I am happy to introduce my newest banner style- my handmade take on the throw-away party store letter banners.
Hang it above your bed, amongst your art collection, below or at the top of your vanity mirror.
● Delicate fringe in a dusty violet shade hangs from a shimmering cord secured with a floral sequin on each side. The letters are in my own handwriting, hand-cut with scissors, and sprinkled with the tiniest golden rectangular shaped glitter.
● About 20 inches long with additional cord on each side for tying.

● Guess what! These banners were written up on Nylon Magazine Daily, Refinery29, and Martha Stewart's Wedding Blog! Also, the Wild Heart banner was part of a Stevie Nick's inspired spread in the November issue of Shop til You Drop.
● Want to see a quick little video of the Love Always banner sparkling? Visit:
http://www.nice-etc.com/2011/03/sparkle-shimmer-shine-and-glitter.html

Wild at Heart - 'This whole world's wild at heart and weird on top.'
Wild Heart by Stevie Nicks
Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken

* Props such as the silver ball garland and over-sized tassels are not included.

name: I Love You banner
description:
»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»
I M P O R T A N T
This style is on Pre-Order. Please allow up to 4 weeks, depending on my schedule, for it to ship.
»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»

I am happy to introduce my newest banner style- my handmade take on the usual throw-away party store letter banners.
Surprise your special someone by hanging an extraordinary I Love You in an ordinary place! Think about their daily routine and where they'd really appreciate a sweet reminder of your love. This isn't just for Valentine's Day. Hang it above your bed or on the inside of your home's front door.
● Delicate bright pink fringe hangs from a shimmering cord secured with a sequin on each side. The I Love You is in my own handwriting, hand-cut with scissors, and sprinkled with the tiniest rectangular shaped glitter.
● About 12 inches long, plus cord on each side.

● Guess what, these banners were written up on Martha Stewart's Wedding Blog, Nylon Magazine Daily + Refinery29!

● Want to see a quick little video of the Love Always banner sparkling? Visit:
